title: BRIEF-Hubei Kaile Sci and Tech to take a stake in big data firm Changxin Changzhong
text:
BRIEF-Hubei Kaile Sci and Tech to take a stake in big data firm Changxin Changzhong Sept 18 
Sept 18 Hubei Kaile Science And Technology Co Ltd 
* Says to invest 140.03 million yuan ($22.01 million) in big data firm Changxin Changzhong for 53.66 percent stake 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1Mv9j5t 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3628 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
